data.title: Katy Perry
data.meta_description: #95 Katy Perry on the 2024 America's Self-Made Women - Katy Perry is a pop star and former American Idol judge who sold the rights to her music collection
data.text:
Katy Perry Misses The Top 40 With Her New Single

Katy Perry's new single "Woman's World" narrowly misses out on becoming another top 40 hit for the pop superstar in the U.K.

Katy Perry’s Decade-Old Smash Becomes A Hit All Over Again

Katy Perry's “Firework” debuts on the TikTok Billboard Top 50 this week following the Fourth of July holiday.

Katy Perry’s New Single Is A Serious Streaming Disappointment

Katy Perry's new single "Woman's World" spent one day on Spotify's U.S. chart—in the lower 100 on the list—and then vanished. That's not a good sign for the tune.

Katy Perry’s Iconic Single Surges Nearly 250% In Streams

Katy Perry's "Firework" surged in popularity around the Fourth of July holiday, with streams increasing by nearly 250%.

Katy Perry's 'Woman's World' Feminist Comeback Song Bombs With Critics—Here's Why It's So Controversial

Critics called Katy Perry a “hypocrite” for collaborating with producer Dr. Luke—who’s been accused of sexual assault by singer Kesha—on a feminist song.

Katy Perry Declares It’s A ‘Woman’s World’ On New Single

Katy Perry has begun her new era, starting with "Woman's World," the lead single from her upcoming seventh album '143.'

Katy Perry’s New Single ‘Woman’s World’ Is An Immediate Top 10 Smash

Katy Perry's new single “Woman’s World” is currently the highest-ranking debut on the U.S. iTunes chart.

Katy Perry Announces Her Long-Awaited New Album ‘143’

Katy Perry's new album 143 is slated to drop on September 20. The first single, "Woman's World," is set to come out on July 11.

Indian Billionaire’s Son Hires Justin Bieber, Rihanna And These Other A-Listers For Wedding Events

Justin Bieber joined the likes of Katy Perry and Rihanna, who had previously performed at pre-wedding events for the soon-to-be Ambanis.

Who Will Replace Katy Perry On ‘American Idol?’ See The Stars In The Running

Luke Bryan recently revealed which singers are "in talks" to replace Katy Perry on "American Idol." Here's the list of stars that could take her spot.

Katy Perry Earns Her First Diamond Album And Several New Diamond Singles Simultaneously

Katy Perry's album 'Teenage Dream' has been certified diamond in the U.S. — moving 10 million units. She now has six diamond songs with two singles earning the certification.

Katy Perry’s New Album Is Already Attracting Controversy, And It Hasn’t Even Been Announced Yet

Katy Perry's forthcoming album reportedly features production from Dr. Luke, the man Kesha once accused of sexual assault.

Can Katy Perry Recapture Her Chart-Topping Magic With Her New Single?

Katy Perry has announced "Woman's World," her first new single in years. The dance-pop tune could help her return to the top of the charts, where she used to rule.

Kelly Clarkson Reveals Why She Can’t Replace Katy Perry On ‘American Idol’

Kelly Clarkson, the first winner of "American Idol," has revealed the reason why she cannot replace Katy Perry as a judge on the show next season. Here's what she said.

Katy Perry Earns Her Highest-Charting Single In More Than A Decade

Katy Perry's smash “Teenage Dream” is back on the U.K. songs chart, earning its loftiest placement on the ranking since early 2011. It's also the top returning hit this week.
